body.name: MGA Entertainment Dream Bella Color Change Surprise Little Fairies 5.5" Doll and Little Unicorn 2 Pack- Jaylen and Ribbon, Pink Fairy and Unicorn, Great Gift, Toy for Kids Ages 3, 4, 5+
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Thursday, February 22 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Tuesday, February 20. Order within 21 hrs 1 min
features: COLOR CHANGE FAIRIES: MGA's Dream Bella Color Change Surprise Little Fairies Fashion Dolls are 5.5" tall and deliver an unboxing experience that is full of 8+ surprises! Surprises include doll, sponge, tub, color change feature and interchangeable fashions- wings, wig, skirt, shoes!
REVEAL DOLL: Dip doll in a room temperature bath to unveil which magical fairy you got!
COLOR CHANGE FEATURE: Dip the sponge in ice water and reveal fairy face decoration you can repeat over & over!
LITTLE UNICORNS: MGA's Dream Bella Little Unicorns are 6" tall and have a long silky mane with iridescent tinsel and tail you can style and brush!

COLLECT THEM ALL: Collect the newest characters from MGA's Dream Ella! Meet DreamBella, Aubrey and Jaylen- the little sisters of DreamElla, Aria and Yasmin and their little unicorn friends Sea Glass, Lavender and Ribbon.
FOR KIDS AGES 3 AND UP: Perfect gift for kids ages 3 years old and up for young imaginative play.
body.description: MGA's Dream Bella inspires kids to be whoever and whatever they can imagine. Kids can create their own fantastical stories or play along with the DreamElla Series. DreamBella, Jaylen and Aubrey are magical little fairies and best friends in the Land of Magic. They are the little sisters of DreamElla, Yasmin and Aria. They're always chasing after adventure as they fly over magical lands, ride unicorns, and hang with their big sisters. Collect all 3 little fairies! #BeWhateverYouDream

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Unboxing Experience Full of Surprises You'll transform your doll from head-to-toe. Dip your doll in a room temperature bath to reveal which magical fairy you got! Color Change Feature Dip the sponge in ice water to see face decoration appear. You can repeat over & over! Interchangeable Accessories Dress up each fairy with her glittery wings, removable layered skirt, molded shoes and wig – which can be mixed and matched with each MGA’s Dream Bella fairy friend!

Each Unicorn Has a Matching Fairy Doll Lavender is Aubrey’s magical little unicorn. Every MGA’s Dream Bella Color Change Surprise Fairy Doll has her own unicorn friend. Doll sold separately. Soft, Brushable Mane Each unicorn has long, silky, brushable mane and tail. Create a unique hairstyle for the unicorn with the included brush. Glittery Decorations Each unicorn has the special MGA’s Dream Bella winged design in glittery gold. Lavender features Aubrey’s rainbow symbol.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars My daughter is happy
reviews.reviewText: These are cheaper version of the Barbie brand Chelsea dolls but my Daughter only had a few dollars from the tooth fairy and wanted it really bad so we ordered it anyway. It’s a good toy for the price and she’s really happy with it. I’m

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2023
reviews.reviewText: As near as this was, I actually had to use a Mr. Clean sponge to get the stuff off the dolls face. It came off easily on the body but not the face or hair.

reviews.reviewerName: david and alicia morgandavid and alicia morgan
reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 16, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Pink fairy came defective twice -broken right leg both times
reviews.reviewText: My daughter loves the Dream Ella unicorns and for her double eye surgery we bought a few of the unicorn/fairy duos here on Amazon to complete her set and help with her healing downtime. We received the blue set and she was so thrilled - all was well and they were in perfect condition. Then the pink set arrived, the fairy out of the box had a sliced in half right leg, but it’s fine, no big as Amazon made it right with a replacement set the next day and she didn’t have to part with that beloved pink unicorn that came with the broken fairy. The set arrives and we get the packaging open, dip the doll and her right leg comes completely off in the middle exactly where the first one was broken right out of the package. Maybe a quality control issue or an assembly line mishap? Who knows, Amazon refunded the item which was lovely but now we have a bummed little one and 2 fairies that can’t be played with.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Returned Item, Not as Represented
reviews.reviewText: I purchased a bunch of these as gifts for Operation Christmas Child Shoeboxes. First of all, the dolls were not the color that I ordered. Secondly, they come naked, and aren't clothed until you drench them in water. Others reported having their skin break out after coming in contact with the water once the doll had been in it. I wasn't taking any chances, so I returned them all.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 23, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars DREAM BELLA Dolls*Great value if its desired by child*Fun dolls from popular ads!
reviews.reviewText: These are cute and reasonably priced Dream Bella Dolls with little ponies and color changing. That said, they aren’t the same quality as Barbie stuff, but still good enough. If your child hasn’t asked for them specifically, then I would skip these due to the little plastic feel.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 28, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Received a different item/color
reviews.reviewText: Ordered the sea glass teal fairy and unicorn. Received the pink. Don't have time to return and receive the correct item in time for the gifting. Disappointed. Item itself is fine. There isn't even a choice in this listing for the item I received.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Rather disturbing upon opening
reviews.reviewText: Doll arrives completely blank. Like an unfinished mannequin. Once you put it in water face appears.Hair is a wig which does not stay in place.Wings broke immediately

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 8, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Order the blue doll if you want pink and vise versa
reviews.reviewText: The doll itself is great, however as of 4/3/22 the pink doll and blue doll are mixed up. I had read previous reviews that said the same thing so I ordered blue and did end up getting the pink one, which is what I wanted. Just keep that in mind when you order.
